author: USA TODAY
title: LeBron pinned layup attempt on backboard
text:

Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs LeBron pinned layup attempt on backboard Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 10:42   
LeBron James' chase-down blocks are always so great. (Photo: NBA on TNT) 
LeBron James at it again with the chase-down blocks. This time it was the Knicks' Courtney Lee who was trying to score a layup. I think he may have even thought about trying to dunk it, it's tough to tell. 
Whatever Lee was trying to do, James said NOPE. â€” NBA on TNT (@NBAonTNT) February 24, 2017 
Not happening. â€” Cleveland Cavaliers (@cavs) February 24, 2017 
Kyrie Irving was loving what he was seeing from James, who finished with a triple-double of 18 points, 15 assists and 13 rebounds in the Cavaliers' 119-104 win over the Knicks. . @KyrieIrving loved that finish by LeBron ðŸŽ¸ðŸ˜‚ pic.twitter.com/GfCSkUYT5b â€” NBA on TNT (@NBAonTNT) February 24, 2017 
One other note from the game: Charles Oakley was in attendance and sat with Cavs owner Dan Gilbert. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/lebron-cavaliers-courtney-lee-knicks-chase-down-block-layup-backboard-pineed-amazing-video-highlight/ Most Popular
